content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_boat
inventory=[{"type": "light_gray_carpet", "quantity": 37, "index": 10}, {"type": "smooth_quartz_slab", "quantity": 58, "index": 11}, {"type": "slime_block", "quantity": 45, "index": 13}, {"type": "jack_o_lantern", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 3, "index": 19}, {"type": "dandelion", "quantity": 20, "index": 24}, {"type": "red_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 15, "index": 27}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 48, "index": 31}, {"type": "green_carpet", "quantity": 49, "index": 32}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 57, "index": 33}, {"type": "bone_meal", "quantity": 54, "index": 35}, {"type": "yellow_carpet", "quantity": 61, "index": 36}, {"type": "pink_terracotta", "quantity": 52, "index": 38}, {"type": "potato", "quantity": 29, "index": 40}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 31, "index": 42}, {"type": "infested_chiseled_stone_bricks", "quantity": 23, "index": 43}, {"type": "spruce_wood", "quantity": 2, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a spruce_boat, I first need to craft spruce_planks. Spruce_planks can be crafted using spruce_wood, which I have in slot 45. Therefore, I will first move the spruce_wood from slot 45 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1
